name: Shangri-La Hotel Jakarta

reviews.text: The Shangri-La Jakarta is one of the most incredible hotels I have ever stayed in. I travel approximately 50% of the time, and I do love FABULOUS hotels. I stayed in a Horizon Club room, and the room and bathroom are almost beyond words. They are stunningly beautiful! The service is extraordinary. Quite honestly, I don’t want to leave!! Thank you Shangri-La Jakarta!!!!
reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant Perfection
One of the best
reviews.text: The Shangri-La is one of the best hotels I've ever been to. Lobby is large and stylish. The rooms are spacious and elegantly furnished, with all kind of gadgets (that also work!). The bed is large and very comfortable. There is a coffee maker. If you need an ironing board, they will bring you one upon request. The bathroom has a separate shower cabinet, lots of high quality towels. They clean your shoes free of charge. Try to get a room with pool view. There is a lovely little tropical garden with a swimming pool. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Food choice and quality is excellant. There is a pub-like bar in the basement with a live band, that however was rather average. Security (access to hotel) is a high priority, you feel safe. No snags? Yes, some really minor ones like: No refill of coffee sachets, laundry was returned too late - but punctual after requesting, some items of the mini bar too many on the invoice. but corrected immediately. All in all. it is really value for money.

When I first went to Jakarta I stayed at the Mandarin Oriental because I was told it was the best place to stay in Jakarta. That was wrong. The mandirn was run down and a 3 star hotel at its best. When I came back from Bali I stayed here at the Shangla La and knew I was in someplace very special. It is a true 4 star plus hotel with many 5 star features.
reviews.title: This is THE place to stay in Jakarta.

likes.liked: — The buffet dinner is world class.

reviews.text: As for location, there is really no central area of Jakarta where is all happening. This hotel is as central as you can get but you really cant walk anywhere from there. But cabs are plentiful and notoriously cheap. You can go anywhere for $2.
reviews.title: Great hotel

likes.disliked: — Restuarant food was ok, but not great

reviews.text: The lobby of the hotel, the pool, and the staff are all outstanding. Everything about them was great with not a single disappointment. But the one feature of the hotel which was nothing less then a mind-blowing outstanding was its buffets-especially for dinner. These buffets were more than 5 stars and as good or better than any others I have every seen. Not just in variety but most importantly in quality. There were buckets of shrimp that were 20 cm long, raw oysters the size of saucers, deserts which included several flavors of homemade ice-cream which could then be mixed with different ingredients alla Cold Stone style. There were different stations for different types of foods: sushi, Indonesian, Chinese, duck, Indian, barbeque, and on and on and on. Everything was top end. The Ritz Carleton Sunday Brunch in Newport Beach California was not as good. As a food lover, this dinner scene at the Shangri la will probably be my most favorable memory of Jakarta which is not a particularly scenic place. The price of the dinner was about $20 US and breakfast which was equally as good was included in my room.
reviews.title: RE : So So Hotel, OK if you are not demanding
It's just okey, not as fantastic as the brand reputation used to be
reviews.text: There is a very popular disco in the basement of the hotel which has a reputation of being the hottest in town. It was very crowded with much local talent. The band was outstanding and from Chicago. But the aspect which killed it for me was the smoking. In Jakarta women think of cigarettes as “glamour sticks” and literally light up on after the other. I sat there and watched young ladies with a cell phone in one hand and cigarettes in the other strike glamour poses with these two prop. When you talked to one of them they had to turn away every few seconds to blow the smoke someplace other than your face. I did not find a single lady who did not have a cigarette in here hand there. So that put the place off limits for me.
Bottom line is that I would stay at this hotel again in heartbeat and would recommend it to anyone going there
reviews.title: WAY MORE than 5 STAR!!!!!!!

reviews.text: I've stayed at the Shangrila several years ago and came back last year for my grand father's anniversary celebration. The food at the function itself was awful, we ordered the most expensive menu but the quality was not acceptable for a five-star hotel. The rooms were great, but the management of the hotel has declined. I left my dress in the hotel room but was never contacted until I've realised a few days later. It was hard to reach hotel staff themselves and they told me the dress was lost. But after a few phone calls they said they found it. However, it had this oil stain on it which they later dry cleaned. We were also given a very large cake as a "sorry" for the horrible food they served at the function.
reviews.title: Ok, but not as great as it used to be

reviews.text: Overall, I've loved the hotel from years ago and am still taken with its beautiful surroundings every time I visit. Staff were friendly but lacked professionalism, there is definate room for improvement. But I will come back since it is one of my favourite hotels.

description: Voted as one of best in the category of Luxury Hotels by 2012 Trip Advisor's Travelers Choice Award, Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta is strategically located in the centre of Jakarta’s Sudirman business district. The hotel is an established luxurious oasis that offers easy access to the very best of Jakarta, easily accessed within 45 minutes away from Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. The hotel comprises 661 guest rooms, including 40 suites, 118 Horizon Club rooms and 60 interconnecting rooms.All rooms give an access to spectacular city views.Embark upon an international culinary adventure at SATOO’s open-kitchen buffet, savour the stylish Italian dishes at Rosso or taste authentic Cantonese cuisine at Shang Palace. Sample sushi and Japanese flavours at Nishimura or indulge in New York-style oversized steaks, pizza and burgers at B.A.T.S.Get toned and energised in our fully equipped state-of-the-art fitness centre, which hosts the highest standard facilities, from the latest high-tech exercise equipment, a multi-purpose workout studio and a convenient lounge bar to the outdoor tennis courts and swimming pool surrounded by a lush garden oasis. Featuring one of the most luxurious private spas in the city, the spa facilities at Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta.
